name: Ready,Steady,Worm
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: ready steady worm
des:
This skill requires a physical copy of the board game "Ready, Steady, Worm!" to play. 

Enter the magical world of Jim Henson's Labyrinth, and add to your worm-racing fun with exciting Alexa functionality. Alexa adds a touch of randomness with new events and challenges throughout your game, perfect for the whole family!

Will you unravel the Goblin King's tricks and get your worm to safety? Find out today in "Ready, Steady, Worm!"

To buy a copy of the board game, visit our website or ask your local retailer.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
